    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/organization/hospitality/v3

    Facet Facility_Query_Hotel

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

</FacilityQueryHotel>

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        HotelName
        A name or partial name of hotel used in searching for a hotel facility.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        BrandCode
        A code that identifies the brand or flag of a hotel, often used for independently-owned or franchised properties who are known by a specific brand.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        BrandName
        The name of a brand of hotels (e.g., Courtyard, Hampton Inn).
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        ChainCode
        The code that identifies a hotel chain or management group. The hotel chain code is decided between vendors. This attribute is optional if the hotel is an independent property that can be identified by the HotelCode attribute.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        ChainName
        The name of the hotel chain (e.g., Hilton, Marriott, Hyatt, Starwood).
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        Radius
        The radius of the search.
        Details
        Type Radius
        Example Value 1234
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        ReferencePoint
        Specifies a reference point from which the search should be preformed.
        Details
        Type ReferencePoint
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        DetailedHotelSearchCriteria
        Detailed search criteria for hotel facilities.
        Details
        Type DetailedHotelSearchCriteria
        Example Value ???
